Name: Ameya
Title: Great time to spend
Review: Excellent beach, have enough activities boring scuba diving, parasailing. clean beach. Not much crowded. We loved it and will go again.

Name: ramanathanv67
Title: Good beach outing
Review: A pleasant morning trip. Could see people trying hands on surf boards, kayaking, fishing etc. The striking thing we experienced is the clean sea- we could see the mollusks floating in and out for each wave ! Close to the Taj Fishermans cove, a good place to spend time with family. I feel morning will be light on crowd.

Name: leelaneeraj1
Title: Nice place to hangout
Review: We came to hangout with my friends we all enjoyed,sunny day weather was good , people was nice and friendly.sea water was good .

Name: Dhwanit S
Title: Decent beach to visit
Review: Beach is relatively clean but often spot various kinds of dead fishes. Parking is ample and free. Toilets are available at â‚¹10 but do not expect much there. Not much crowded as there is lot of space to walk around. Try fish fries if you like street food. There are many resorts around but I think only Taj has private beach.

Name: Rina Cannon (NÃ©e Purba)
Title: Sightseeing
Review: Nice beach. It was so windy when I was there. Relatively clean beach. Lots of fishing boats. Quite a lot of visitor as well. There is a small place like an eating joint where you can eat seafood. Nice experience

Name: TravelTime
Title: Huge beach
Review: On the way to Mahabalipuram, you can plan to visit this beach, evening times would be better, it is huge and not very crowded as well if you move a kilometer or two from Kovalam beach

Name: Cosmopolitan332905
Title: Good for groups
Review: Beautiful beach. Atmosphere is good. Best to watch sunrise. Parking will be full in the evening. Very clean but fish smell is there. Good for groups.

Name: Meeran Haja Mohideen
Title: Handsome Hamlet on the verge of being endangered
Review: For over 5 decades, I am forever enticed spending time on Kovalam beach and never ever get bored.Well, there is beast to bash the beauty as always in the form of waste water mismanagement, trash control and other needy infrastructure including roads etc.

Name: Divyangna P
Title: Serene Beach
Review: Loads of sails catching fish. Slightly smells of fish. Not too excess. Water is clean and can go for a light swim. Shore is full of shells and dead crabs :(

Name: Ahamed
Title: Very much crowded
Review: Went on Sunday...was very much crowded. Fish fries are good to eat here. I would recommend to visit this beach.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Has to improve the surrounding cleanliness
Review: This is one of the famous spot along the east coast road among the locals as well as the tourists but still the cleanliness of the place has to be improved.

Name: S.A
Title: Beach is good with limited options
Review: Beach is good with limited eating vegetarian options. No water sports available. Only speed boat is there. Speed boat is also expensive. Government should develop this beach. Sea Water is partially clean compared to other beaches in India.

Name: Ramya S
Title: Good beach
Review: The kovalam beach is a beach set in about 40 kilometers from Chennai. The water was amazing and great. Spotting some corals on the shore was a surprise. It is one of the popular beaches in Chennai. Many food stalls, especially seafood, are available in this beach.

Name: sandy s
Title: Place to enjoy with family...
Review: Here only the famous Tamim al-Ansari shrine is there and we can buy a sea foods in cheap rate also. In that beach there is a surfing school also who is having interest in surfing you can go there.

Name: lvishy
Title: Wow
Review: Hi friends kindly visit bay restaurant at kovalam Vivanta. Food is delicious. Authentic aroma and flavours . Iam sure you will not regret . Karan was helpful though he is with other restaurant. Ambiance is superb. Lovely evening

Name: Azara T
Title: Great but seems to be crowded
Review: The beach was great to look at and all but it was very crowded. There were a lot of stalls with food, items etc. You also could ride on a horse for a short distance.

Name: BBhusanMohanty
Title: Great Place for Young people.
Review: Kovalam neach bit away from Chennai zone can be hang out place for young kids who wants to roll down. But all activities can be takencare with care.

Name: Rajagopal S
Title: Didnt like it
Review: Horrible parking.. especially if u are riding ur car. There is no traffic sense. Beach also isn't that clean. I would prefer some other beaches in ECR. Overall an average experience !

Name: Vishal Balwani
Title: Great beach with less crowd than that on other beaches of chennai
Review: Just outside the beach there are too many food stalls and small restaurants that sell fresh catch of everyday. You can also experiece fine dining near by the beach or for a more cafe like atmosphere, can visit Surf Turf cafe. For more adventuurous kinds, you can jog along the shore till Mahabalipuram, 19kms in total.

Name: Rahul R
Title: Nice to walk
Review: Pretty crowded, good for night walks and sea food. Restaurant food is slightly on the higher price list. Late night transportation is hard to find.

Name: MohamedIsmail_INDIA
Title: Beach is Just OK ....Dirty and polluted  Water
Review: People visiting Ansari Dhargah Kovalam spends time here in the Beach. Beach is polluted with fish wastes, Garlands, water color turns to Black and more salty than any other beach.

Name: ramchabi
Title: Famiily Beach
Review: Chennai is blessed to have a long coastal line.  However, as in most places in India, there is always too many people...not here.Getting to Kovalam beach isnt easy and Im quite happy about this. The beach is mostly clean and we always have a great time.

Name: kim G
Title: spoilt by rubbish
Review: its the only safe swimming in that area, lots of small fishing boats there. take lots of pencils for the kids;

Name: Sameer A
Title: Nice place overcrowded!!!
Review: This place famous for Dargah which is nearby, people come all over the place, Nice place but overcrowded and shops selling fried fish which makes this place smells fish all over..

Name: ramya3101
Title: Best place for family with kids
Review: Kovalam Beach was a pleasant surprise for us.. All our kids enjoyed the beach and the rides n games like balloon shooting.. Not over crowded.. But,it was very difficult to find parking..

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Nothing Much to View, Just Beach
Review: This is the First view point one can witness when you are reaching to ECR from Vandaluru Route. Nothing much is there to view other than Beach. One beach side temple is there to visit.

Name: Indiran_Kolappan
Title: Good for a evening visit
Review: The Kovalam beach is on the outskirts of Chennai after Muttukad. The beach is crowded on weekends and visit on the weekday evenings are a better option. Earlier it used to be frequented by few and now there is a good crowd so a lot of shops have come up on the beach spoiling the beauty.

Name: worldwomantourist
Title: Adventure beach sports
Review: Kovalam Beach is located on city outskirts near Mahabalipuram. this is the only place in Chennai were we can find some adventure sports on shore side  like surf-boarding, boat rides, banana rides, etc. A best place to relax during weekends.

Name: Joeswamy
Title: Fishing hamlet cum beach attraction
Review: It is 30 kms from Adyar Chennai on the East Coast Road. From the main Highway you have to go through winding roads through the town to reach the beach about a kilometre for the highway.The beach is a big curved one with rocky shores. Good place to visit. lots of games near the beach is another attraction.There is a fish market near the beach and you can get fresh catch every dau.. But the price is no different from the city. You have to bargain a lot to get the fish you want..A good rustic experience.

Name: Prabha K
Title: Good for half day visit.
Review: ** Best for group tour.** Nice place to enjoy with friends in weekends.** You will enjoy the surfing.** Famous Masque is here.

Name: s_ramsam
Title: Good for a visit
Review: Located on the outskirts of Chennai, this is relatively less crowded which makes it rather attractive. Otherwise like so many other beaches. Some adventure sports facilities are available for those so inclined.

Name: Arun
Title: One of the famous beaches in Chennai
Review: It is located on the outskirts of Chennai and it is also a famous spot for water sports. People who love water adventures and sports can visit this place. You will find a lot of packages online as well.

Name: JUNI-BANERJEE
Title: Sand and Serenity of Kovalam Beach
Review: Visited this beach with my friends and saw the lovely color of the sea, felt the serenity of the beach and enjoyed some pineapple juices :)

Name: krazikams
Title: Adventure Sports on Beach
Review: Only place in Chennai were you may find some adventure sports on shore side... like surf-boarding, boat rides, banana rides, so on. Located on city outskirts near Mahabalipuram, it is a perfect place to getaway on weekend from Chennai.

Name: shri047
Title: Peaceful beach !!
Review: Beach is located away from the city.Good beach for hangout with friends and family. Not much crowded and you will get your time to enjoy beach side.

Name: Arun K
Title: Decent beach
Review: Visited this beach with my family after dropping a friend at the airport. Beautiful place to visit early morning. During the second visit in the evening, the place had some fun games around - tossing a ring to collect available objects, etc.The place also has a huge collection of fish.Must visit place in the ECR stretch.

Name: Akashdx
Title: A Silent Beach away from City Rush
Review: I liked this Beach other than any beach in Chennai.The way towards it is somewwhat like a Undeveloped village but overall beach is Quite.And Gives great look of Nature

Name: dilshadkn123
Title: Beautiful "
Review: Despite the soaring heat in kovalam atmosphere was pleasant here at 12pm. Childrens enjoyed by eating prawns fry which is cooked instantly in the near by small shops. Fisherman trying to exploit the tourist by selling the fishes at a rate of unimaginable. Dont go across for this type of.

Name: Talhas
Title: Needs lot of attention from Local Authority
Review: Very crowded with hapazard parking of cars and trucks. Suggest to park your vehicle in private parking area (Rs. 30 per car) and walk few meters to the shore. local vendors litter the place and spoil the atmosphere.

Name: kashif k
Title: from main city a roadtrip rather than going to beach-still best beach of chennai
Review: this place is 56 kms from main city (anna nagar) city roads are full of traffic and ECR is good but it is only around 10 kms. there is an alternative way that was good through NH 32. you can not do anything there except swimming in a water full of filth.I liked:very low slopethats itI disliked:filth everywheresmell of fisha lot of people ruined my holiday, on holiday i want to be at peaceyou bring camera there, waterproof if possible, nice shots you can take while in the waterwe planned our visit at 03:30we left home at 04:30we reach there at 05:45we were finished at 05:50(includes swimming)and still i dont feel I missed anything thereso its rather a short visit, maximum stay there should be 2 hrs.so we spent almost 2hrs and 30 minutes at roadwe spent 1 hr at beachMY TITLE JUSTIFIES IT

Name: Ra_Radha
Title: Clean Beach
Review: Located outside city limits, this beach is frequented by foreigners and adventure enthusiasts. You can try surf-boarding here with help of coaches. Stay safe.

Name: Deevakar K
Title: Nice Beach
Review: Visited with family and kids at 4.30PM, it's was hot but when we stepped in the water it felt much better. Lot of fisherman boat near the entrance but one can walk a bit or sit in the rocks in the shore. Overall good to visit if you are visiting near by crocodile bank.

Name: Inderjit Singh
Title: Refreshing Beach
Review: Last Tuesday during my Chennai trip on way to Mahabalipuram had a chance to experience Kovalam beach which is on ECR  apprx 40 kms from Chennai.Its lovely picturesque beach not crowdy as compared to Marina beach.Its a long beach good for quite walks but waves r big sometimes.A dargah n temple nearby n few eateries mainly seafood.Parking no issues.lovely for sunsets. Ideal for daylong picnics..

Name: Sajin P
Title: Things Have Changed
Review: After almost an year, visited Kovalam Beach again. Now there are no more land rides available. Eventhough, only 2 or 3. It was fun. And now the beach is getting more crowded.

Name: cool1960
Title: Good Beach with less crowd
Review: Nice place to visit with not much of crowd. Parking of cars are available. The beach is neat and you can relax there as the crowd is not there much.

Name: Samshell2015
Title: Stinky and average beach
Review: I would definitely not suggest this beach for a visit as it is mainly a fishing beach and stinks. There were lot of fishing boats parked along the shore hence to get a proper calm place to sit, you need to walk a bit along the beach shore. I visited this beach on a Saturday evening as this was very near to my house like around 8 km. If you are new to Chennai then there are better beaches to explore like breezy beach and Elliot's beach which are more cleaner. The crowd at the beach was less and you can easily get paid parking near the beach. The sea was rough and the waves get higher and higher as the sun sets so be aware if you are not a swimmer. You can find too many fortune teller's with a cute little parrot in a cage hanging on their arm and can definitely try your luck as they charge just rs. 30/- per person. I did try it and it was not so worthy. Beware of beggars around the beach as they curse you if you don't offer them money ðŸ˜œðŸ˜œ. This is not the place for people who is looking to spend some peaceful and quality time with family. Worth a visit ?? definitely No.

Name: Rucha121
Title: Isolate from City.. but a lovely beach on ECR
Review: Located on ECR away from bustling noise of city, it offers recreational trip and peaceful time with family or friends on the shores.. watching Bay of Bengal in all its pomp and glory, hitting Chennai coast and beautiful waves. You can spot few adventure activities taking place here, but it seasonal, depends on wave and weather. Very peaceful and isolated beach. Not advised for girls to go alone.

Name: Lakshmi Narayanan S
Title: Clean beach but little isolated
Review: This beach is on the outskirts of Chennai. Beach is cleaner compared to the beaches inside the city. Also it is less crowded. It is not advisable to visit this beach in the late evening on weekdays as it is very deserted and not safe. On weekend beach is relatively more crowded.

Name: HASPvlogs
Title: Beautiful!!!
Review: Went to the Kovalam beach in Chennai in NOV 2016,,,its a beautiful beach.... Suggested to go early morning and see the sunrise....its awesome... :) Ideal for photography in the morning...you get fresh fish right outside the beach...

Name: Suryadip
Title: It is recreational and short evening trip
Review: I was visited that place yesterday and it is second time in last one month. This is very near to my home at padur. But as a Sunday it was a bit overcrowded but any how it was a good enjoyable. I am giving some of my snaps of yesterday which may help you to get the idea. There are not so much option of food some Street food stalls are there of sea fishes but not sure how much hygiene it maintained. Also we seen one tortoise there.

Name: @AmolAnadi
Title: Awesome
Review: My kid n my family had a lot of fun at this beach. One of the less crowded n cleaner beach in Chennai, must visit if you are on the east coast road

Name: Arun A
Title: Beach out of city
Review: Kovalam beach is located between Chennai and Mamallapuram. Its around 25 KM from Chennai. There is Darkha and a temple at Kovalam which is a tourist attraction. The beach is neat.

Name: ganeshpkumar
Title: Road less travelled
Review: Located about 50 kms from Chennai is this wonderful beach, currently being famous for surfing. Yes there is a surfing school Covelong established where we can get surfing lessons. They also organise yearly international level surfing competition and music festivals. The beach also has rocky shore lines.

Name: pushpanjalikumar
Title: hidden jewel of a beach
Review: This beach is less heard of and is 40 kms from heart of chennai. However the beauty is worth the journey. The area is swamped with sea water and creates amazing scenery in itself. The stones on the beach provide good place to sit and enjoy.

Name: Pawan G
Title: Sunrise photography trip
Review: Awesome drive via OMR which is safer than ECR. Reach this beach before sunrise! The sunrise and the sea against the rocks on the beach is such a serene view to look at!! Must visit place for trying long exposure shots

Name: akki4865
Title: Travel
Review: After midday I was looking for the good place and beach I love it I go on beach there re many people.beach is really beautiful and I also visit mgr temple

Name: kumarjayamalla
Title: Cool and Nice place
Review: Not much crowded and cool to enjoy beach view and food stalls are good transportation is availble all the time that is good part.

Name: Aishwarya S
Title: Sea Diving
Review: we around 8 people went for a mid sea diving in kovalam beach, it was a very good experience.. there local boat man are running these kind of activities, it is so safe to go. I wondered in Chennai there are these types of adventures to do :) really surprised and impressed. for going inside sea, we were given life jackets which was of good quality, and we went in in a motor boat and at one place boat man said we can jump into water, the boat had a rope tied along with it, we all get down into water and its fun was immeasurable :D we spend almost 1 hour inside water playing floating :D it was a very good experience :) even old people, kids also came there just to go for a boat ride inside sea :) but the sea shore was so dirty, they can keep it clean and improve tourism. Chennai can bring more water sports game like this and attract tourists :)

Name: Shyamis
Title: Quieter and cleaner
Review: If you are looking for something quieter and cleaner than the Marina and also don't mind the long drive on ECR then this beach is for you.

Name: Ismail_is123
Title: Must visit if you are on the way to mahabalipuram...
Review: Not very crowded beach..If you are a fish lover , then you will love this place.. You will find shops selling fried fish for a cheap price all around.. I have seen few shops allowing people to drink liquor as well..They sell fresh fish which is just out of water on the shores for a very cheap price ..

Name: Virendra Mishra
Title: A good beach with cleaned and less visitors
Review: I used to visit this place every weekend morning 6 to 8 am with my friends and used to walk without shoes between Taj Vivanta hotel to Kovlam fish market. The beach around the fish market is very dirty but after hotel Taj to toward VGP resort is very good with very few visitors.

Name: Hari P
Title: Overcrowded beach in sundays
Review: I loved here to surf. Which is so thrilling. People here are enjoying with their family. nice clouds and waves are interesting.

Name: shwetado
Title: Clean and beautiful
Review: The beach was clean. I had gone in the rains so being a weekend there was not much crowd there. That is what I enjoyed the most. Also, you will find small sea shells there which you can take back as a token of your visit.

Name: ReviewsByAZ
Title: skip, its not what it used to be years ago - its become rotten and dirty
Review: years ago, this used to be the place to go,  for a good time at the beach, but on a recent trip kovalam heavily disappointed. the approach was hard, but the driver found it. the immediate vicinity of the beach was dirty, filthy strewn with plastic bags and plastic disposable water pouches, bused everywhere with loads of travellers from other states and overall felt very unsafe and unhealthy. the beaches were equally dirty - would not recommend at all. was not expecting western standard beaches, but even this was a bit much. we ended up going to another beach up the road towards the city

Name: SagarVS
Title: Dirty beach
Review: I see no reason for you to visit this beach. Its dirty for sure and the same as any fishing hamlet down the coast from Chennai. If you go after 9 am you might see the fishermen come back from sea with their normally disappointing catch. But, that you can see in other places too. Also be careful when you swim, there are no guards, no warnings and people have drowned before. Skip.

Name: Biplab Lenin
Title: Wonderful Beach
Review: Nice beach, nice place, enjoyed a lot with fiends. love to visit again. one of the clean beach in India

Name: Nedungilli
Title: Good beach to visit
Review: I have at least visited this place 15 times in past 8 months. I usually start 6:00Am on saturdays using OMR. In OMR once you reach kelambakkam take left to reach Kovalam beach. THe main purpose I go there is to buy fresh fish. If you reach there by 6:00AM you can see 100s of boats returning with lot of fishes. If you want to buy fish directly got to fisher man and start negotiating. I wont say it would be cheap but surly fresh.For a fish worth of 300Rs . The price will start from 500. But you can ask your price. Do not hesitate to ask the lowest price. I usually ask for Rs100 for worth of Rs 300. SoI will end up paying RS 250. But its all based on your skiil to talk to them in local language.If you have the skill to identify fish name by just looking at it and familiar with its price, then you can make good buy.Those people will easily identify your knowledge on fishes. For example if you ask them , " Is this fish good for frying? " It simply shows your lack of knowledge in fish. If they find you dont know about fish then differently you will be cheated.You will also find small market and local women selling fishes there. Never buy from them. Instead you can buy spoiled fish from roadside shop at higher price. If you want to know more about this place, Please write to me.

Name: vadivel77
Title: Not good place to relax
Review: The beach is not clean and it smell bad . If you want to get fish/prawns fresh this is the place. Nothing else you could do here.

Name: Lavanash
Title: Fishermans paradise
Review: Located alittle on the outskirts, best to go by car as a group and during the day. The beach can be reached by driving through a fishing hamlet. There was direct access through a Mosque, but now as the crowds are more we have to walk or drive around the mosque. Pleasant nice beach with lots of rocks and many fisher boats. There are fish shops selling fried fresh fish. Not a very safe location for visitors in the nights.

Name: Shantanu Jalgaonkar
Title: Kovalam Beach: A good beach to spend evening in Chennai
Review: I was here in month of June. Beach was in good condition and was properly maintained. Even in June, it was very hot here hence it was difficult to walk in day time due to hot sand.One can enjoy in evening. Sea Bathing is prohibited.

Name: asp_smc
Title: Good and bad !
Review: This located on the way to mahabalipuram.. good thing about this beach is easy accessibility by road, shallow water areas to enjoy the sea.. but it's not that clean compared to other beaches in and around chennai, one should avoid rocky areas in the beach to avoid injury , also the local people. Can visit once.

Name: Kaushal16
Title: terrible and dirty beach!!!
Review: the beach is located at a fanatic location and has beautiful shape.. but it is mostly filthy and smells bad.. most of the places u will find fisherman boats and no place to really enjoy the beach..

Name: lpkc
Title: Pleasant Surprise
Review: We planned to go to Kovalam Beach when we were out of options nearby. But we were quite surprised. the beach has lot of rocky formations where we could actually climb. The place that we approach the beach might be crowded with the fisherman boats and the fish market etc. But we can walk past this and walk further right the beach will be quieter and neater. The place is not commercialized yet. It is very less crowded than other beaches of Chennai. So don't expect coffee shops/ ice cream parlors next to the beach front. The beach is at a walkable distance from the bus stop.

Name: wellsitekumaran
Title: Best beach in chennai in terms of safety and waves
Review: I am learning surfing in kovalam beach since last few months. Initially i have perception that this place is not so safe like other beaches in chennai, but everything changed in my first few visits itself. Kovalam is safe place due to its local fishermen community. Sea is more safe due to its coast shape line and rocks near south of the beach give very decent waves for surfers.Visit often kovalam beach then one can realise its beauty.

Name: Sanjeev_Sharma
Title: Dirty , Not maintained - Can be Avoided
Review: The place is dirty and full of vendors all around. you hardly get any space to walk around herenot a place where you can enjoy your time

Name: Karthik R
Title: Not a clean beach
Review: This beach has a great view and a little rocky beach with excellent views, however the approach roads and the beach are very untidy and less hygenic. The parking areas are very limited and not controlled. There are private parking slots which they rent out for Rs.30. Though they are comfortable, unsure about safety and the area is very limited.The beach is crowded on weekends and the approach is full of vendors and narrow approach.One can visit if in Chennai or pass by on ECR as a stop, other than that, a planned visit to this beach is not worth it.

Name: VALLALAAR
Title: Time and Tides wait for none
Review: This is a natural beech where the young and old could enjoy. From Broadway and from Koyambad, Thambaram there are enormous buses are plying.   You can surf here enroute to Mahabalipuram andd Pondicherry route , what is called as ECR East Coast Road.   Through this way you can reach Pondycherry shores..Avoid Sundays and national holidays.    Somewhat unclean.   Visitors..pl.  don't spoil the natural environment.   This is not a suitable place in the odd hours....

Name: Karanveer N
Title: Amazing day !!!!!
Review: If you are in chennai and are going to mahabs or pondicherry, take a left turn on the way and visit this beach.Not many touristsow about it.Its shallow clear water is marvellous.You can go upto the surf school to surf or hire a boat which will take u to the middle of the bay of bengal where you can dive into the sea (with a life jacket on) and swim.One of kind of an experience. ..... must try !!!!!!!

Name: Venu M
Title: rapid wave beach
Review: the beach is flat but not neatly maintained,,the waves are rapid so one can enjoy them to the maximum

Name: srimant2006
Title: Rushless beach
Review: Kovalam beach is nearer to Chennai City.There are so many buses plying between city and beach city,From Koyambedu Central bus stand A/C buses are available upto Kelampakkam.This beach is only about 3 k.ms from here.You can hire Autorikshaw from here at nominal tariff.The beach is unspoilt,and no crowd like famous beaches of Chennai.You can negotiate and purchase freshcach variety fishes directly from fishing boats.

Name: senthilkumar_s3
Title: avoid weekends
Review: visited the beach 4months back when the fishing season started .try to avoid the beach on weekends as it is so crowded and we find it difficult to park but luckily there was a private parking available , kovalam beach has good rocks which is so nice to sit and enjoy .you can take good snaps  standing on the  rock setting . you see lots of fish stalls cooking and serving i never tried so no comments. be extra carefull on the sand while walking  as there was no proper maintance we can see beer bottles,plastic bags , etc.

Name: smartwanderer
Title: Nice clean and serene beach
Review: Its away from the hustles of the city. Its quite clean and i liked the serenity of the place. there are some rocks also on the beach making it more beautiful. Its not commercialized yet. So there are no shops or market nearby. Overall a good place to visit on the ECR Road especially if you are travelling to Pondicherry from Chennai

Name: sreenivasaprasad
Title: Beach beautiful
Review: A beautiful beach clean & beautiful.a vast sea of water everywhere.Nice to play around in sea water & sand.

Name: Shanmuga Prakas... M
Title: If you are a Veg... Please don't visit
Review: Last month we decided to go on a evening to this beach, the place is full of bad smell and lots of shops blocking pedestrians and lot of encroachments. Not a place if you are a veggie since we are veggies too we couldn't stay beyond 5 minutes because of the bad smell. But the another most awkward thing is even the shore is occupied by lots of boats and there is not place to sit and spend time with you loved ones. unwanted parking charges too...

Name: Deepak Praveen
Title: Kovalam Beach,Chennai
Review: Kovalam beach  is a fishing hamlet about 50 Kms from Chennai , off East Coast Road a visit is recommended during morning hours between 6-8 if you like to watch the fishermen set out to the sea and return back with their catch , one could also pick up fresh fish from the nearby market.Not the cleanest of the beaches hence dont have much expectations.

Name: Sanjukta R
Title: Best sunrise
Review: With east coast you always want to visit the beaches in early morning. Rising sun looks awesome. But the heat in Chennai in too much to bear  after the sun rises so dn not plan to stay there for too long.To go the beach take a bus to Kelambakkam. From there take auto or 6 sitters or if you are in a big group you can even broad a small matador to reach Kovalam.

Name: Abhijit Sarkar
Title: Smelly Aweful
Review: Never try this place..the moment u land u r struck by aweful dry fish smell ready to be fried & served..unmaintained beach..fishermen area..better avoid

Name: Dipsy1982
Title: Very  clean and safe
Review: It was pleasant experience very clean and safe.went with family in December 2013 it had mixed crowd (foreigners, Indians ). Water was clean and good for fun

Name: YasInai
Title: A nice place to relax
Review: Its few kms away from Chennai....But it is very good to visit since it is very less crowded than other beaches....

Name: Karthick_Madurai
Title: A nice place to enjoy the nature
Review: Kovalam beach is on the East coast road next to Muttukaadu. While driving from Chennai you need to take a left turn just a kilometer after the Muttukadu Bridge. The diversion would take you to the Kovalam village and to the beach. The beach is an crescent shaped one and the view from the beach is lovely. The beach is having a mixture of sand and rocks which is a nice one. Itâ€™s would be a great experience to sit on a rock and enjoy the bash by the waves. The neighborhood of the beach not seems to be much friends and safe.  So please be cautions and avoid visiting the place during odd hours.

Name: oppraveen
Title: Chennai's Surfers paradise.
Review: This is a great place just outside Chennai is also know as covelong beach. The Surf is very good for surfers and one can see many surfers riding the wave. The beach is reasonably clean. Stay away from the place after dusk. I hope the locals must take steps to make this place safe from drunkards. Fishermen are helpful. One can get a good view of the shore temple from here.

Name: Nikhil Komath
Title: Good but Watch out
Review: This beach has lots of potential in terms of tourism but it has been misused like anything, You can see lots of alcohol bottles on the way left by drunkards who misuse the place. Beach was neat and we played football on the beach, It was real fun time. If you are going with family avoid the after 6pm time, you may be trapped by some antisocial elements.

Name: Aaqarsh Aiyyar
Title: getting worse..
Review: I've been going to this beach for the past 20 years and it has gotten more dirtier, filthier and unsafe of late. Never land in this beach with your family in the dim light. Whilst there are some good spots to sit and relax, you will have to bear the stagnant stinky drainage, avoid the fisher folks' boats and more importantly the slippery fungus and corals. It is getting crowded, especially on weekends and holidays, because of its proximity to a dargah.The beach is now well-linked to all the parts of Chennai city. Its getting from bad to worse.

Name: Neo123456
Title: Calm and Less crowded...good for surfing
Review: There are not many people around. You could just come here and relax...the beach is fine, not very dirty...fishermen around....lot of surfers I saw surfing....the beach had good surfing waves...not exactly towards the beach but at an angle,,,overall nice place to spend a couple of hours at..!
